statements: SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT id, detected_fraud FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = FALSE ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND detected_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'payment');
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND detected_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-03-01' AND detected_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id, activity_type;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE GROUP BY user_id, activity_type;
SELECT user_id, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, MIN(activity_date), MAX(activity_date))) AS avg_time_between_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LAG(activity_date) OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY activity_date) AS last_activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LEAD(activity_date) OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY activity_date) AS next_activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LAG(activity_type) OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY activity_date) AS last_activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LEAD(activity_type) OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY activity_date) AS next_activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LAG(activity_date) OVER (ORDER BY activity_date) AS last_activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LEAD(activity_date) OVER (ORDER BY activity_date) AS next_activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LAG(activity_type) OVER (ORDER BY activity_date) AS last_activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LEAD(activity_type) OVER (ORDER BY activity_date) AS next_activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LAG(activity_date) OVER () AS last_activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LEAD(activity_date) OVER () AS next_activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LAG(activity_type) OVER () AS last_activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, LEAD(activity_type) OVER () AS next_activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, MIN(activity_date), MAX(activity_date))) AS avg_time_between_activities FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_time, user_id FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT * FROM DetectedFraud;
SELECT detection_id, activity_id, detection_time, detection_result FROM DetectedFraud;
SELECT activity_id, activity_time, user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT detection_id, activity_id, detection_time, detection_result FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT detection_id, activity_id, detection_time, detection_result FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_id, activity_time, user_id, activity_type FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Payment';
SELECT * FROM DetectedFraud WHERE activity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT AVG(activity_time) FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT MAX(detection_time) FROM DetectedFraud;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT activity_id, COUNT(*) FROM DetectedFraud GROUP BY activity_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_type FROM FraudulentActivities ORDER BY user_id, activity_type;
SELECT AVG(CAST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM activity_time) AS INTEGER)) FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT activity_id, COUNT(*) AS fraud_count FROM DetectedFraud GROUP BY activity_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT activity_id, activity_time, user_id, activity_type FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_result = TRUE;
SELECT activity_id, activity_time, user_id FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = '98765432-1012-4567-8901-210987654321';
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT * FROM DetectedFraud INNER JOIN FraudulentActivities ON DetectedFraud.activity_id = FraudulentActivities.activity_id;
SELECT activity_id, detection_result FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_result = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM AGE(activity_time))) AS avg_activity_age FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT activity_type) AS num_unique_activities FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_unique_activities DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE char_length(activity_description) > 100;
SELECT user_id, MAX(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM AGE(activity_time))) AS max_activity_age FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT detection_id, detection_time, detection_result FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, ARRAY_AGG(activity_type) AS activities FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM AGE(activity_time))) AS avg_activity_age, MAX(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM AGE(activity_time))) AS max_activity_age FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM AGE(activity_time))) AS max_activity_age FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT user_id, array_length(STRING_TO_ARRAY(user_id::text, '-'), 1) AS id_parts FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT detection_id, detection_time FROM DetectedFraud WHERE detection_result = FALSE ORDER BY detection_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM AGE(activity_time))) AS total_activity_duration FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_activity_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT AVG(created_at) AS avg_creation_date FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email NOT LIKE '%@test.com';
SELECT MIN(created_at) AS earliest_creation_date FROM users;
SELECT MAX(created_at) AS latest_creation_date FROM users;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS user_count, MAX(created_at) AS latest_creation_date FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT MAX(created_at) AS latest_user_created_at FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users;
SELECT AVG(created_at) AS avg_created_at FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-04-01';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT username) AS unique_usernames FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT MIN(created_at) AS earliest_user_created_at FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-03-15' AND username <> 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice' OR email = 'alice@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND username = 'bob';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users_created_in_2022 FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT activity_date, activity_location FROM FraudulentActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousTransactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM SuspiciousTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT registration_date FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ActionLogs;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM ActionLogs WHERE action_type = 'login';
SELECT action_time FROM ActionLogs ORDER BY action_time ASC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_description FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_location = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_time FROM ActionLogs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, activity_date, activity_location FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT log_id, user_id, action_type, action_time FROM ActionLogs WHERE action_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT activity_description, activity_date FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 AND transaction_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT activity_description, activity_date FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%' AND user_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_logs, action_type FROM ActionLogs GROUP BY action_type ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT user_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', AGE(now(), registration_date))) AS avg_days_since_registration FROM UserProfiles GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM ActionLogs WHERE action_time > '2022-06-01' GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_logs > 10;
SELECT user_id, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, activity_location, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id, activity_location;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY transaction_date;
SELECT user_id, DATE_TRUNC('week', action_time) AS week_start, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM ActionLogs WHERE action_time > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id, week_start HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id, DATE_TRUNC('month', registration_date) AS month_joined, COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM UserProfiles GROUP BY month_joined;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, user_id FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions;
SELECT * FROM UserWatchlist;
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserWatchlist;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory;
SELECT history_id, user_id, transaction_id FROM TransactionHistory;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentPatterns;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM FraudulentPatterns;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, user_id, activity_timestamp FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_timestamp FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, username, watchlist_reason FROM UserWatchlist WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT history_id, user_id, transaction_id, transaction_status FROM TransactionHistory WHERE user_id = 101112;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, detection_algorithm FROM FraudulentPatterns WHERE pattern_id = 131415;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM UserWatchlist WHERE watchlist_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM FraudulentPatterns WHERE detection_algorithm = 'Complex';
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(activity_id) > 5;
SELECT a.user_id, b.username FROM FraudulentActivities a JOIN UserWatchlist b ON a.user_id = b.user_id;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_timestamp > '2022-05-01';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY transaction_id, user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_status = 'Pending';
SELECT th.user_id, th.transaction_id, st.transaction_amount FROM TransactionHistory th JOIN SuspiciousTransactions st ON th.transaction_id = st.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentPatterns WHERE detection_algorithm = 'ML';
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT * FROM UserWatchlist WHERE watchlist_reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(history_id) AS history_count FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT a.user_id, b.username, c.watchlist_reason FROM FraudulentActivities a JOIN UserWatchlist b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN UserWatchlist c ON a.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_timestamp) = 8;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM SuspiciousTransactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE history_id IN (SELECT history_id FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_status = 'Blocked');
